answers.answer: Hi!There are various conditions which can cause a blister. These include excess heat or cold, herpes, diabetes, psoriasis, hypothyroidism, contact dermatitis, atopic dermatitis and malnutrition. Do not burst any blister on your own. Apply any moisturizer or calamine lotion on this to soothe the pain and take any OTC painkiller such as ibuprofen. Consult a doctor to find the cause. Take care!
